title: cpp tests are failing on Linux
body:


Also, there are memory-related warnings:
```
[ctest] malloc_consolidate(): unaligned fastbin chunk detected
[ctest] malloc_consolidate(): invalid chunk size
[ctest] corrupted size vs. prev_size in fastbins
[ctest] free(): double free detected in tcache 2
```

_NOTE_:
Tests run separately succeed (besides crash :eyes: ) , example:
```
$ ./TestStatusGoQtModule --gtest_filter=AccountsAPI.TestGenerateAccountWithDerivedPath_WrongPassword
Running main() from /home/conan/w/BuildSingleReference/.conan/data/gtest/1.11.0/_/_/build/521ce6d2b56041e08ea425948717819429cfbc29/source_subfolder/googletest/src/gtest_main.cc
Note: Google Test filter = AccountsAPI.TestGenerateAccountWithDerivedPath_WrongPassword
[==========] Running 1 test from 1 test suite.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 1 test from AccountsAPI
[ RUN      ] AccountsAPI.TestGenerateAccountWithDerivedPath_WrongPassword
INFO [10-19|13:49:25.966] Status backend initialized               backend=geth version=0.111.4 commit=616a58f5c IpfsGatewayURL=https://ipfs.status.im/
Unknown signal received:  mediaserver.started
[       OK ] AccountsAPI.TestGenerateAccountWithDerivedPath_WrongPassword (3730 ms)
[----------] 1 test from AccountsAPI (3730 ms total)

[----------] Global test environment tear-down
[==========] 1 test from 1 test suite ran. (3730 ms total)
[  PASSED  ] 1 test.
corrupted size vs. prev_size in fastbins
[1]    1248171 IOT instruction (core dumped)  ./TestStatusGoQtModule 
```

### Acceptance criteria:
- fix tests
- make Linux tests run on CI
